Class AppDriver

java.lang.Object
modernappliances.application.AppDriver
public class AppDriver extends Object
Main driver class of the program. Contains the entry point.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main entry point of program. Calls all the functions needed for program features. Contains main menu for displaying options and accepting user input for choosing options.
      Parameters:
      args -

    • readData

      private static List<String> readData()
      Method for reading data from the appliances.txt resource file. Will read line by line and add these lines as strings to a list of strings. Each line contains information on a single appliance.
      Returns:
      list of strings, each string is one appliance
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException

    • parseApplianceData

      private static List<List<Appliance>> parseApplianceData(List<String> applianceData)
      This method parses the list of strings from ReadData() into a list of Appliance objects.
      Returns:
      nested generic collection of Appliance objects

    • getUserInput

      private static int getUserInput()
      Method that gets user input and converts it into an integer. It catches number format exceptions to prevent crashing the application.
      Returns:
      inputNum from user inputted string
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException

    • searchApplianceNumber

      private static Appliance searchApplianceNumber(List<List<Appliance>> appliancesList)
      Searches through the nested collection of Appliances using the appliance's item number.
      Parameters:
      appliancesList -
      Returns:
      Appliance object or null

    • purchaseAppliance

      private static void purchaseAppliance(List<List<Appliance>> appliancesList)
      Simulates purchasing an appliance by decreasing its quantity. If there are 0 appliances it will warn the user that appliances are out of stock and not decrease quantity. If there are less appliances than the amount the user purchases, decreaseQuantity() will notify the user that there are not enough appliances and not decrease quantity.
      Parameters:
      appliancesList -

    • searchAppliancesBrand

      private static void searchAppliancesBrand(List<List<Appliance>> appliancesList)
      Searches for Appliances of a given brand name and displays a list of them.
      Parameters:
      appliancesList -

    • displayAppliancesType

      private static void displayAppliancesType(List<List<Appliance>> appliancesList)
      Displays appliances in a list of appliances of the same type. Takes user input to choose an appliance type to display.
      Parameters:
      appliancesList -

    • generateRandomList

      private static void generateRandomList(List<List<Appliance>> appliancesList)
      Chooses the given amount of random appliances to display in a list. Takes user input to determine amount of appliances to add to list.
      Parameters:
      appliancesList -

    • storeData

      private static void storeData(List<List<Appliance>> appliancesList)
      Adds data stored in appliancesList to the appliances.txt file for storage.
      Parameters:
      appliancesList -
